glosses: To smear by drawing or painting with a pen, pencil or paint.
To cross out a text by drawing over it.
To write or draw as a draft; to sketch.
To slander or defame someone, to besmirch.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish قرهلامق (ḳaralamaḳ, “to blacken, to cover a paper with writing calligraphic exercises, scribbling etc.”), from Ottoman Turkish قره (ḳara, “black”), from Proto-Turkic *kara (“black”), morphologically kara + -la + -mak.
